attributes.action: pledge more money and support to end human trafficking in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British government have failed to adequately address the insufficiency of safe migration options which can lead to human trafficking.

Tying work permits for migrants to jobs means that governments implicitly legalise a potentially powerful means for unscrupulous employers to, at a minimum exploit, and at a maximum, force labour.
